short_summary: Documents for contractors providing storage and shelter equipment forDATED Construction
description: This solicitation is for the procurement of "Documents for contractors providing storage and shelter equipment for DATED Construction ***increased requirement***". The intent of this solicitation is to determine the eligibility of companies to provide storage and shelter equipment in support of DATED Construction ***increased requirement***. This will ensure that only registered contractors who can meet the requirements are able to provide support
full_summary:
================ofilm contains parts of vehicles. Contracts are for the procurement of various vehicle equipment components.
### Tender Information

*   **Title (English)**: Vehicular Equipment Components
*   **Title (French)**: Composants et accessoires de véhicules
*   **Reference Number**: cb-378-60139371
*   **Amendment Number**: 5
*   **Solictation Number (English)**: W8486-249617/A
*   **Publication Date**: February 14th, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date (English)**: April 2, 2024 @ 2:00 pm
*   **Tender Status (English)**: Expired

### Requirement

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals to supply vehicle maintenance parts. These parts are detailed below, including the required specifications and quantities.

#### Items to be Supplied

The Department of National Defence requires the delivery of vehicle maintenance parts as follows:

1.  **Item 1**: Filter element, fluid (2940-00-125-9544)
    *   P/N desired: 1HA609
    *   NSCM/CAGE: 75Q65
    *   Quantity: 40
    *   Unit of Issue: Each
    *   To be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta
2.  **Item 2**: Nut, plain, hexagon (5310-00-271-4656)
    *   P/N desired: 7H3607
    *   NSCM/CAGE: 11083
    *   Quantity: 500
    *   Unit of Issue: Each
    *   To be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
3.  **Item 3**: Ring, retaining (5325-00-420-3858)
    *   P/N desired: D25279
    *   NSCM/CAGE: 10988
    *   Quantity: 6
    *   Unit of Issue: Each
    *   To be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
4.  **Item 4**: O-ring (5331-00-557-8426)
    *   P/N desired: 1S4974
    *   NSCM/CAGE: 11083
    *   Quantity: 4
    *   Unit of Issue: Each
    *   Shelf Life:
